# Overview of Meta-data
```{r eval=FALSE}
install.packages("bookdown")
# or the development version
# devtools::install_github("rstudio/bookdown")
```
 This file stores the datasets used for Sarah Smith-Tripp's MSc thesis (2021). All inquiries for the data should be sent to ssmithtr@wellesley.edu . This database includes  
<ol> 
<li> Index </li>
<li> Overview of plot set-up \@ref(intro) </li> 
<li> RPA Aquired Data \@ref(drone) </li> 
<ol>
<li> Raw photos and flight details  </li>
<li> Processed DAP point clouds </li>
<li> Canopy Structure Rasters </li>
<li> Lidar DEM Rasters <li>
</ol> 
<li> Microclimate Data \@ref(micro) </li>
<ol>
<li> Raw Microclimate Data </li>
<li> Processed Microclimate Data </li>
</ol> 
<li> Field Collected Data \@ref(fielddat) </li>
<ol> 
<li> GPS Points </li> 
<li> Leaf Area Index LiCOR data </li>
<li> Vegetation and Litter Data </li> 
<li> Soil Data </li>
<li> Compiled Vegetation Data </li> 
</ol> 
<li> Soil Temp Data \@ref(soiltemp) </li> 
<li> R Files used for thesis + Paper \@ref(Rprocessing)</li>

```{r echo = FALSE, Meta_Data_Outline, fig.cap='Overview of Available Data', out.width='80%', fig.asp=.75, fig.align='center'}
data_outline <- knitr::include_graphics("_bookdown_files/figures/Meta_Data_Outline.png")
data_outline
```
